t: What's going on with Amazon? No shipping box or bag - Bogleheads.org
s: The box is always an appropriate size for the contents, while other places are quite happy to ship you one softball in an 18" carton. And Amazon has been using some kind of thinner corrugated cardboard for several years now, they can't be the only ones able to get it...

t: Amazon
s: If you receive an incomplete product back, you need to open a Safe-T claim with amazon, which will require photographic evidence. ... You may have the option to file a safe-t claim. I would also suggest is contacting the Police and asking them to investigate.

t: Amazon.com: Customer Questions & Answers
s: Alexa tells me every other day that All Packaing during Holidays will come in a box that Will Not Show what the contents are... sadly, that is not true. My gift to my daughter is ruined because saw the product. If I had known, I would have gone out and got it myself.

t: If someone orders multiple items on Amazon will they all come in the same shipment? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 21): It depends. If all the items were stored at the same facility, then yes. But not all items sold on amazon are kept in every facility. They do this in order to maximize how many items can be sold on amazon. By not keeping all items at all fulfillment centers, they have more space...

t: Item missing/damaged from Amazon order? Steps to quickly contact support to get a replacement
s: October 18, 2020 - I ordered few items from Amazon.com last week and when the package is delivered I found an item is missing. I reached out to Amazon Customer care and they resolved the issue by resending the missing item.

t: What should you do if your Amazon package is missing one of the items you ordered? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 10): I’ve had that happen just once. What I did was contact the seller and explain I order 2 of X, and received 1 of X. They immediately apologized and said a replacement would be shipped forthwith. It was, and I received it. Now, in a sense is was my word against the order. Howeve...

t: How Can a Brand Stop Buy Box Suppression? | Pattern
s: Along with affecting sales, suppression can erode customer trust in your product, your relationship with Amazon, and retail partner relationships, leading you to the Profitability Death Spiral. In many cases, Buy Box suppression happens because no seller is eligible to win the Buy Box. Maybe ...

t: Box in another box? Or only one box?
s: I will be sending 28 units each being a box containing multiple items (dimensions 5,71x8,46x8,46 inches, 25 oz.). Each box is a variety pack containing different kinds of coffee etc. I am selling the box itself as one unit and not its contents individually.

t: Missing Amazon Package - Amazon Customer Service
s: If your Amazon package shows as delivered but you are not able to find it, visit Amazon Customer Service website. Find details on how to track your order down.

t: Amazon wants to ship your orders without a box. Shoppers worry it will boost package theft, but psychology shows it could actually deter it
s: August 11, 2023 - In the past year, Amazon has cut down on packaging in order to reduce costs, make faster deliveries, and reach its sustainability goals. In 2022, about 11% of items the company delivered were shipped without the signature Amazon-branded box and instead came in their original containers, according ...

t: Lost my own buy box, yet I'm the only one selling this ...
s: There are other sellers who are selling a generic version of my improved product at 4 times my current price and they have the buy box. not sure what i'm missing.. ... So I have a branded product, with a patent, and I'm the only one selling it. I've had no issues with the buy box till this morning.

t: 13 Amazon Errors That Kill Your Sales & How To Fix Them: ASINs & More
s: March 6, 2020 - Sending product listings to Amazon isn't an easy task. Help yourself by using an automated feed to make the process of debugging Amazon feed errors easier.

t: I am sick and tired of Amazon's “empty box” problem
s: I am brand registered and Project Zero approved. I’ve had many ups and downs over the past 3 years but nothing is as frustrating as the “empty box” issue. Here’s what happens: I send my items to Amazon to be sold FBA. A customer buys one of my items and Amazon ships it out.

t: What I can do if Amazon give me empty box instead of item? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 9): You have to be able to prove to them that you never got the item. They will say that the item was shipped and delivered. What you can do is call the place it was shipped from and file a complaint and hope they have mercy on your words. The investigation will be long and drawn out.

t: Amazon Certified Ships in Product Packaging - Amazon Customer Service
s: We reduce packaging by certifying products that can ship safely without an Amazon box, envelope or bag. The product inside is the same.

t: Amazon Business Consolidated Shipping - Amazon Customer Service
s: Amazon Business offers combined shipping options on large business orders, reducing the number of shipments or packages you will receive.
